price: 52. Ma aanu soo dirin hortaa Rasuul ama Nabi aan markuu hadlayey (ama wax akhrinayey) aanu wax ku tuurin sheydaanku akhrintiisa, wuxuuse Alle nasakhaa oo tiraa waxa uu shaydaan soo tuuro, markaa Alle sugaa Aayadahiisa16. Allena waa wax kasta Oge, Xakiim ah.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٖ وَلَا نَبِيٍّ إِلَّآ إِذَا تَمَنَّىٰٓ أَلۡقَى ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فِيٓ أُمۡنِيَّتِهِۦ فَيَنسَخُ ٱللَّهُ مَا يُلۡقِي ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ ثُمَّ يُحۡكِمُ ٱللَّهُ ءَايَٰتِهِۦۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ
footnotes: 16. Markuu Nabigu s.c.w. akhriyo Aayad loogu digayo gaalada, waxay gaaladu ku kordhin jireen waxaan jirin ama u fasiri jireen si kale, markaasuu Alle caddeeyaa arrimahaa khaladka loo fahmay si uu meesha uga saaro wax mugdi ah ama shaki.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnā min qablika min rasūlin walā nabiyyin illā idhā tamannā alqā al-shayṭānu fī um'niyyatihi fayansakhu al-lahu mā yul'qī al-shayṭānu thumma yuḥ'kimu al-lahu āyātihi wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
